EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Your Submission
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> THANK YOU Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you for your interest in the Beta testing for the GoDirect Flight Planning website and GoDirect Flight Bag Pro iPad application. We’ll respond to your request shortly.
Thank you,Honeywell Aerospace
